document_data.name: Unicorn pendant
document_data.mainbody: '''Unicorn pendants''' were magical amulets embossed with the holy symbol of the deity [[Lurue]].
document_data.Description: Bearing the head of unicorn, a ''unicorn pendant'' could be made of [[silver]] or sculpted of [[marble]] with a [[gold]] horn.
document_data.Powers: The wearer of the pendant gained the ability to cast ''[[cure moderate wounds]]'' and ''[[neutralize poison]]'' once each per day. [[Paladin]]s who wore this pendant had their "lay on hands" healing ability enhanced.
